transcript.sentence: A glowing explosion on a dark background reveals the word dust.
On a restaurant window. Coach in a italiana.
A maitre d shows a couple in their mid twenties to a table with a white tablecloth near the window.
Bell house productions presents.
He pulls out a chair and guides her into it.
He put her napkin in her lap.
He sits across from her and picks up a menu. His face lights up when he looks up at her.
Text in holographic writing. Future boyfriend.
Your waiter drops off plates of spaghetti and meatballs.
Stewart stares at the waiter, who knows is his intense gaze.
The waiter walks away. Stewart leans over and cuts up the kelly's meat balls.
She crabs his hands.
She leans towards him and nuts.
She stares at him, eyebrows raised, and mouth open.
He removes a piece of his watch and puts it on the table.
He presses on it, and a glowing orb appears in the air then a holographic man appears.
A buffering symbol shows over the holograph.
Kelly flail her hands towards the holograph. Stewart turns it off by pressing on the device again.
He shifts in his seat and gives a small smile.
Her waiter approaches and refills their wine glasses.
He feeds her.
He scoots his chair towards her and re activates his device.
Holographic video.
Skirt blows out the birthday candles, while elderly kali watches with confusion.
Current, kali flail her hands at the video.
He turns it off.
Kelly drupes in her chair.
Stewart watches her leave mouth, opening like he wants to call after her. Then he drops back into his chair.
The waiter brings him the bill in a leather folder.
Stewart digs his wallet out of his pocket and gives payment to the waiter.
The waiter looks bemused as he walks away.
Stewart re activates his device, and the holographic man reappears.
Stewart slacks. A video of himself feeding elderly kali.
She reluctantly takes the spoon into her mouth, then spits the food back out. When he looks at the camera,
We swick as to another video.
Current kelly rushes back in. Stuart turns off his device as she finds her purse hanging on the back of her chair.
He stands eagerly.
Lips pressed tight. She nods.
She offered her hand in the shake.
He opens the door for her as they leave the restaurant together.
Closing credits, directed and edited by ben rock, written by a vincent warwick, produced by ron morehouse and emily bell.

audio_descriptions.notes:
[00:00:00.15] A glowing explosion on a dark background reveals the word "dust".

[00:00:04:37] Bellhouse Productions presents...

[00:00:07:60] On a restaurant window: Cucina Italiana

[00:00:11:45] A maitre de shows a couple in their mid-twenties to a table with a white tablecloth near the window

[00:00:22:97] He pulls out a chair and guides her into it

[00:00:28:15] He puts her napkin on her lap

[00:00:35:12] He sits across from her and picks up a menu. His face lights up when he looks up at her

[00:00:42:21] Text in holographic writing: Future Boyfriend

[00:00:47:04] The waiter drops off plates of spaghetti and meatballs

[00:00:50:25] Stewart stares at the waiter, who notices his intense gaze

[00:00:57:51] The waiter walks away. Stewart leans over and cuts up Kailey's meatballs

[00:01:14:72] She grabs his hands

[00:01:42:66] She leans towards him and nods

[00:01:49:87] She stares at him, eyebrows raised and mouth open

[00:02:15:76] He removes a piece of his watch and puts it on the table

[00:02:18:62] He presses on it and a glowing orb appears in the air, then a holographic man appears

[00:02:24:74] A buffering symbol shows over the holograph

[00:02:45:01] Kailey flails her hands towards the holograph. Stewart turns it by pressing on the device again.

[00:03:14:21] He shifts in his seat and gives a small smile

[00:03:30:14] The waiter approaches and refills their wine glasses

[00:04:23:20] He feeds her

[00:04:43:44] He scoots his chair towards her and reactivates his device

[00:04:55:62] Holographic video

[00:05:17:21] Stewart blows out the birthday candles while elderly Kailey watches with confusion

[00:05:25:42] Current Kailey flails her hands at the video

[00:05:31:32] He turns it off

[00:06:39:50] Kailey droops in her chair

[00:07:24:36] Stewart watches her leave, mouth opening like he wants to call after her, then he drops back into his chair

[00:07:37:49] The waiter brings him the bill in a leather folder

[00:07:41:67] Stewart digs his wallet out of his pocket and gives payment to the waiter

[00:07:50:85] The waiter looks bemused as he walks away

[00:07:58:09] Stewart reactivates his device and the holographic man reappears

[00:08:24:88] Stewart selects a video of himself feeding elderly Kailey

[00:08:32:82] She reluctantly takes the spoon into her mouth, then spits the food back out when he looks at the camera

[00:08:40:24] He switches to another video

[00:08:54:54] Current Kailey rushes back in. Stewart turns off his device as she finds her purse hung on the back of her chair

[00:09:30:10] He stands eagerly

[00:09:34:56] Lips pressed tight, she nods

[00:09:43:96] She offers her hand and they shake

[00:09:51:81] He opens the door for her as they leave the restaurant together

[00:10:05:43] Closing credits: directed and edited by Ben Rock, written by A. Vincent Warich, produced by Ron Morehouse and Emily Bell

result.title: Sci-Fi Short Film "Future Boyfriend" | DUST Exclusive Premiere
result.description:
Subscribe and watch more sci-fi shorts on DUST: http://bit.ly/2aqc5vh

"Future Boyfriend" by Ben Rock
Written by A. Vincent Ularich

A woman's date takes a strange turn when the man she's been seeing reveals his strange backstory.

For more info on the film and filmmakers check out these links:
www.futureboyfriend.net
www.ronmorehouse.com
www.emilybellactress.com

DUST: Binge-watchable Sci-fi
DUST is the first multi-platform destination for binge watchable sci-fi. We feature science fiction short films and other content from emerging filmmakers with stunning visual effects, captivating plots and complex character explorations. Robots, aliens, space exploration, technology, and human experience are all a part of DUST. Explore, subscribe and follow for more:
